results.t: SURPRISED | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: Aug 28, 2024 — feeling or showing surprise because something has happened that you did not expect: He seemed surprised by the question.
Aug 27, 2024 — : feeling or showing surprise because of something unexpected; was very surprised to see her; there was too surprised to speak a surprised expression.

results.p: Aug 27, 2024 — Synonyms for SURPRISED: dumfounded, startled, wondering, awed, bewildered, awestricken, astounded, amazed; Antonyms of SURPRISED: ...

results.t: SURPRISED | definition in the Cambridge Learner's Dictionary
results.p: Aug 28, 2024 — feeling surprise because something has happened that you did not expect: [ + to do sth ] I'm surprised to see you here. She wasn't surprised at his decision.
surprised · astonished · bewildered · dazed · frightened · shocked · startled · stunned. Strong matches. alarmed, astounded, confounded, stupefied.
Surprised has synonyms in words like astonished, amazed, and flabbergasted, but the latter three convey a greater sense of shock or bewilderment. You are ...
6 days ago — If you are surprised at something, you feel that it is unexpected or unusual. She was surprised at what happened.
to strike or occur to with a sudden feeling of wonder or astonishment, as through unexpectedness: Her beauty surprised me.
Caused to feel surprise, amazement or wonder, or showing an emotion due to an unexpected event. Synonyms. edit.
